summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ZWAP! Coin cryptocurrency app. Backend APIs working correctly with 92.9% success rate. Frontend fully functional with wallet connection, tab navigation, and all core features operational.

integration_issues.issue: After wallet connection, app redirects to pending action tab instead of dashboard
integration_issues.note: This is actually correct behavior - user gets taken to the feature they clicked

passed_tests: Welcome screen displays correctly with ZWAP! logo and 3 action buttons
Wallet connection modal shows all 4 options (MetaMask, Trust, Speed, Help)
Wallet connection creates user with 100 ZWAP starting balance
All backend APIs working (user creation, faucets, shop, swap, prices)
Tab navigation works between all 5 tabs (Home, Move, Play, Shop, Swap)
MOVE tab displays step counter and tiered earning system
PLAY tab shows zBricks game ready state with Start Game button
SHOP tab displays Zupreme Imports with 12 product items
SWAP tab shows live crypto prices and exchange form
Shop items load correctly with categories
Crypto prices load from CoinGecko API
Swap execution working with proper fee calculation
